name: Room Conundrum
description:
Room Conundrum is a puzzle game in which your goal is to get out of the rooms by using the allotted tiles.

You will be running out of space in the room 

-You cant go Back to the tiles you have been to .
-Tiles will get destroyed randomly around the tile you step on.

Controls:

Mouse Click: To navigate to the Tiles.

R: To Reset the level.

Assets Used For The Jam:

Character: https://free3d.com/3d-model/girl-blind-703979.html

 BG Music: https://www.weloveindies.com/en

Fence: https://free3d.com/3d-model/fence-43609.html

Epic Game Asset Packs
- Dreamscape Nature : Meadow- Stylized Open World Environment
- Free Furniture Pack
